channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lights heading out of Cheltenham not detecting vehicles, 6th September
item.description:
The sign for ‘wait here’ is too far away from the temporary traffic light causing the lights not to change and a dangerous back up of traffic. The sign needs to be moved next to the traffic light as it is on the opposite side, currently the light heading towards Cheltenham gets priority causing dangerous overtakes and almost grid lock traffic throughout the day!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 251, London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Sunken area has been surrounded by ugly Glos Highways barriers -, 5th September
item.description:
Please confirm WHAT Glos Highways are actually doing to RESOLVE this issue which I reported 3 YEARS ago. Stop prevaricating and do something positive please. Orange barriers is NOT a proper solution Do I need to lodge an ombudsman's complaint to get action - if so, kindly let me know and I certainly will? Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Ivy Bank, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Road narrows temporary traffic sign left on the verge, 5th September
item.description:
Just before the cemetery entrance on the grass verge in Bouncer's Lane a triangular 'road narrows' temporary warning sign has been left behind by a road contractor. Please remove

item.title: Road sign and bollard left after Priors Road resurfacing completed, 5th September
item.description:

item.title: Restricted parking in cul de sac, 5th September
item.description:
Cul-de-sac 61-81 sussex gardens. I and other neighbours are really annoyed about parking restrictions on our road from 11-2pm Monday to Friday which have been on place for years (I think initially it was to stop people parking whilst working and roads were getting congested. I can understand it on main road but not cul de sac. Also there are problems when people visit esp cos my husband is very elderly. Please could someone contact me to chat about this? Also I regularly see man on moped coming and putting tickets on cars...nice little easy earner our street isn't it. Look forward to hearing from you. Sandra Smart
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sussex Gardens, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road is constantly wet, 5th September

item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Several non-traffic signs on lampost near c&g roundabout, 5th September

Simply alerting you to the malfunctioning of the pedestrian crossing light at the SafeStorage side of the pedestrian crossing on the very busy Wyman's Lane towards the junction at Tewkesbury Road., 5th September
item.description:
The green crossing light fails to light up...leaving pedestrians on that side of that very busy road waiting...and - missing the chance to cross safely if no-one's crossing from the other side - then waiting some more! My best wishes,
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsditch Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working
